participant_1.background:
I am passionate about civic engagement and making my voice heard.
I am a 30-year-old female who has been trying to be kinder to myself lately.
i like action movies.
i m married and have three kids.
I enjoy spending my free time reading about different cultures, and learning about the world.

participant_2.background:
I rely on public transportation because my eyes are too weak to drive.
I'm not always graceful, but my kids find it hilarious when I trip over my own feet.
i work for a magazine.
My favorite thing to do is read, but I would be unable to do it if I were blind.
I love sharing stories of my adventures with my family and friends over a home-cooked meal.

content.text: It's going great! How are you doing?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm excited to meet you today.
I'm excited to meet you too! I've heard great things about you.
Aww, that's nice to hear! What kind of things have you heard?
I've heard that you're passionate about civic engagement and making your voice heard. That's really inspiring to me.
Thank you! I'm always trying to be a better advocate for the things I believe in.
That's awesome! I think it's really important to stand up for what you believe in.
I agree! I think it's one of the most important things we can do as citizens.
Absolutely! What are some of the things you're passionate about?

I'm passionate about making sure everyone has access to quality education, healthcare, and other essential services. I also care deeply about protecting the environment and ensuring that future generations have a healthy planet to live on.
Those are all really important causes! I'm glad you're so passionate about them.
Thanks! I think it's important to care about the world around us and to try to make it a better place.
I totally agree! I think it's amazing that you're so dedicated to making a difference.
Thank you! I appreciate that. It's something that I'm really passionate about.
I can tell! It's really inspiring.
Thanks! I'm glad I could inspire you.
You're welcome! I think it's really important to be passionate about something and to try to make a difference in the world
